title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta according to package instructions.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta with bacon and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
